page.title: 06ROBERT DAVIES,AGE 11,HUNDALL
page.content: "I wake up on Saturdays about 8:30 a.m. to watch Wide Awake Club on T.V. My mum brings my 2000 AD, which is a comic about the future. "After I've read it I walk round to my cousin, Andrew Broadhead's house. We meet other friends & run to the school field & play football. At 11:30 I walk to my Nan's & have a sausage sandwich. In the afternoon I meet Andrew again & we go to Chesterfield. We look in shops & mess about in lifts. We catch the bus back & at 4:30 I eat my tea, perhaps a chicken portion or turkey drumstick. "After tea (5:30 p.m.) I go to Andrew's house (again!), & play at Advanced Dungeons & Dragons, a fantasy role playing game. 9:30 p.m. is the time that I go back home. I watch late night horror films on T.V."
